trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell cmdlet

trans-unit.source: Stop-Service
trans-unit.target: Stop-Service

trans-unit.source: Stop-Service
trans-unit.target: Stop-Service

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 简述

trans-unit.source: Stops one or more running services.
trans-unit.target: 停止一个或多个正在运行的服务。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 语法

trans-unit.source: InputObject (Default)
trans-unit.target: InputObject （默认值）

trans-unit.source: Default
trans-unit.target: 默认值

trans-unit.source: DisplayName
trans-unit.target: DisplayName

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: The **Stop-Service** cmdlet sends a stop message to the Windows Service Controller for each of the specified services.
trans-unit.target: **停止服务** cmdlet 为每个指定的服务向 Windows 服务控制器发送一条停止消息。

trans-unit.source: You can specify the services by their service names or display names, or you can use the **InputObject** parameter to pass a service object that represents the service that you want to stop.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定按其服务名称或显示名称的服务也可以使用 **InputObject** 参数来传递表示要停止的服务的服务对象。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 示例

trans-unit.source: Example 1: Stop a service on the local computer
trans-unit.target: 示例 1︰ 本地计算机上停止服务

trans-unit.source: This command stops the Performance Logs and Alerts (SysmonLog) service on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 此命令停止本地计算机上的性能日志和警报 (SysmonLog) 服务。

trans-unit.source: Example 2: Stop a service by using the display name
trans-unit.target: 示例 2︰ 停止服务使用的显示名称

trans-unit.source: This command stops the Telnet service on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 此命令停止本地计算机上的 Telnet 服务。

trans-unit.source: The command uses **Get-Service** to get an object that represents the Telnet service.
trans-unit.target: 该命令使用 **Get-service** 来获取表示 Telnet 服务的对象。

trans-unit.source: The pipeline operator (|) pipes the object to **Stop-Service**, which stops the service.
trans-unit.target: 管道运算符 (|) 通过管道将对象向 **停止服务**, ，后者会停止该服务。

trans-unit.source: Example 3: Stop a service that has dependent services
trans-unit.target: 示例 3︰ 停止具有依赖服务的服务

trans-unit.source: This example stops the IISAdmin service on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 此示例将本地计算机上停止 IISAdmin 服务。

trans-unit.source: Because stopping this service also stops the services that depend on the IISAdmin service, it is best to precede **Stop-Service** with a command that lists the services that depend on the IISAdmin service.
trans-unit.target: 由于停止此服务还会停止依赖于 IISAdmin 服务的服务，因此最好在前面放置 **停止服务** 命令列出依赖于 IISAdmin 服务的服务的命令。

trans-unit.source: The first command lists the services that depend on IISAdmin.
trans-unit.target: 第一个命令列出依赖于 IISAdmin 的服务。

trans-unit.source: It uses **Get-Service** to get an object that represents the IISAdmin service.
trans-unit.target: 它使用 **Get-service** 来获取表示 IISAdmin 服务的对象。

trans-unit.source: The pipeline operator (|) passes the result to the Format-List cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 管道运算符 (|) 将结果传递给 Format-List cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: The command uses the *Property* parameter of **Format-List** to list only the **Name** and **DependentServices** properties of the service.
trans-unit.target: 该命令使用 *属性* 参数 **Format-list** 若要仅列出 **名称** 和 **DependentServices** 服务的属性。

trans-unit.source: The second command stops the IISAdmin service.
trans-unit.target: 第二个命令停止 IISAdmin 服务。

trans-unit.source: The *Force* parameter is required to stop a service that has dependent services.
trans-unit.target: *强制* 停止具有依赖服务的服务所需的参数。

trans-unit.source: The command uses the *Confirm* parameter to request confirmation from the user before it stops each service.
trans-unit.target: 该命令使用 *确认* 参数在停止每个服务之前向用户请求确认。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 参数

trans-unit.source: -Confirm
trans-unit.target: -Confirm

trans-unit.source: Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 将提示您在运行 cmdlet 前进行确认。将提示您在运行 cmdlet 前进行确认。

trans-unit.source: -DisplayName
trans-unit.target: -DisplayName

trans-unit.source: Specifies the display names of the services to stop.
trans-unit.target: 指定要停止的服务的显示名称。

trans-unit.source: Wildcard characters are permitted.
trans-unit.target: 允许使用通配符。

trans-unit.source: -Exclude
trans-unit.target: -排除

trans-unit.source: Specifies services that this cmdlet omits.
trans-unit.target: 指定此 cmdlet 省略的服务。

trans-unit.source: The value of this parameter qualifies the *Name* parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此参数的值限定 *名称* 参数。

trans-unit.source: Enter a name element or pattern, such as s*.
trans-unit.target: 输入名称元素或模式，例如 s *。

trans-unit.source: Wildcard characters are permitted.
trans-unit.target: 允许使用通配符。

trans-unit.source: -Force
trans-unit.target: -Force

trans-unit.source: Forces the cmdlet to stop a service even if that service has dependent services.
trans-unit.target: 强制 cmdlet 来停止服务，即使该服务有依赖服务。

trans-unit.source: -Include
trans-unit.target: -Include

trans-unit.source: Specifies services that this cmdlet stops.
trans-unit.target: 指定此 cmdlet 将停止的服务。

trans-unit.source: The value of this parameter qualifies the *Name* parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此参数的值限定 *名称* 参数。

trans-unit.source: Enter a name element or pattern, such as s*.
trans-unit.target: 输入名称元素或模式，例如 s *。

trans-unit.source: Wildcard characters are permitted.
trans-unit.target: 允许使用通配符。

trans-unit.source: -InputObject
trans-unit.target: -InputObject

trans-unit.source: Specifies **ServiceController** objects that represent the services to stop.
trans-unit.target: 指定 **ServiceController** 这些对象表示要停止的服务。

trans-unit.source: Enter a variable that contains the objects, or type a command or expression that gets the objects.
trans-unit.target: 输入一个包含对象的变量，或键入可获取对象的命令或表达式。

trans-unit.source: -Name
trans-unit.target: -Name

trans-unit.source: Specifies the service names of the services to stop.
trans-unit.target: 指定要停止的服务的服务名称。

trans-unit.source: Wildcard characters are permitted.
trans-unit.target: 允许使用通配符。

trans-unit.source: -NoWait
trans-unit.target: -NoWait

trans-unit.source: Indicates that this cmdlet uses the no wait option.
trans-unit.target: 指示此 cmdlet 使用的任何等待选项。

trans-unit.source: -PassThru
trans-unit.target: -PassThru

trans-unit.source: Returns an object that represents the service.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个表示服务的对象。

trans-unit.source: By default, this cmdlet does not generate any output.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，此 cmdlet 将不产生任何输出。

trans-unit.source: -WhatIf
trans-unit.target: -WhatIf

trans-unit.source: Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 显示如果运行 cmdlet 则会发生什么情况。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 该 cmdlet 不会运行。显示在 cmdlet 运行时，会发生什么情况。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.
trans-unit.target: cmdlet 未运行。

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 支持以下常见参数:-调试-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction、-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 和-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 输入

trans-unit.source: System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController, System.String
trans-unit.target: System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController System.String

trans-unit.source: You can pipe a service object or a string that contains the name of a service to this cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过管道将服务对象或一个字符串，包含服务对此 cmdlet 的名称。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 输出

trans-unit.source: None, System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController
trans-unit.target: 无、 System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet generates a **System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController** object that represents the service, if you use the *PassThru* parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 生成 **System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController** 对象，表示该服务，如果您使用 *PassThru* 参数。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this cmdlet does not generate any output.
trans-unit.target: 否则，此 cmdlet 将不生成任何输出。

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: You can also refer to **Stop-Service** by its built-in alias, **spsv**.
trans-unit.target: 此外可以指 **停止服务** 别名来对其内置 **spsv**。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_Aliases.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 about_Aliases。

trans-unit.source: **Stop-Service** can control services only when the current user has permission to do this.
trans-unit.target: **停止服务** 只有在当前用户有权执行此操作时才能控制服务。

trans-unit.source: If a command does not work correctly, you might not have the required permissions.
trans-unit.target: 如果某个命令不能正常工作，则可能你不具有所需的权限。

trans-unit.source: To find the service names and display names of the services on your system, type `Get-Service`.
trans-unit.target: 若要查找的服务名称和您的系统上显示的服务名称，键入 `Get-Service`。

trans-unit.source: The service names appear in the **Name** column and the display names appear in the **DisplayName** column.
trans-unit.target: 服务名称将出现在 **名称** 列和显示名称将出现在 **DisplayName** 列。

trans-unit.source: RELATED LINKS
trans-unit.target: 相关的链接

trans-unit.target: Get-Service
